subject: Hallo!
body:
Do not ignore me plbease,
I found your email somewhebre aand now decided to write you.
I am coming to your place in few weeks and thought we 
can meet each other. Laet me know if you do not mind.
I am a nice pretty girl. Don't replya to this email. 
Email me direbclty at who@MailVisionWorld.info
